name: Hide 'n Go Pacman
description:
This was an assessment task for Introduction to Games Programming at UTS as part of my Bachelor of Science in Games Development.

In this task, we had to analyse and recreate as many features of the original Ms. Pacman as possible, with some alterations:

  • Ghost movement is different between ghosts
  • Art assets are made by hand and do not have to match the original exactly.

Additionally, we also needed to iterate and innovate on the original Pacman concept. For this I decided to make a  more suspenseful Pacman, where the player cannot see the map other than locally around themselves and around the power pellets. The color of the light around the player becomes more red and the ghost movement audio the player hears becomes louder the closer a ghost is to the player.
